list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Analyzed weather dataset to answer key questions
- Found all unique 'Wind Speed' values using `nunique()` and `unique()`. - Calculated occurrences of 'Clear' weather using `value_counts()` and filtering. - Identified instances where 'Wind Speed' was exactly 4 km/h. - Checked for null values using `isnull().sum()` and `notnull().sum()`. - Renamed 'Weather' column to 'Weather Condition' using `rename()`. - Calculated mean 'Visibility' and standard deviation of 'Pressure'. - Added insights and results for each analysis step.

task.summary: Initial Commit: Setup Project and make dataset
